name: Greg's Labyrinth
description:
Use WASD/Arrow Keys to Move (Hold Shift = Run) Use Mouse to Look Around

  1. Collect Keys
  2. Open Corresponding Locks
  3. Find Final Door
  4. $ $ $

This game is meant to be difficult- but it is possible to complete!!!

See if you can discover the secrets of.... GREG'S LABYRINTH

Music: http://www.bensound.com "Funky Suspense"
